member.name: T:Khronos.World.HumperMapObject
member.summary:
Generic base-class for Humper collision objects. Automatically add themselves on Enabled=true and remove themselves when Enabled = false
Implemnetations must describe how to add and remove themselves.

member.name: T:Khronos.World.GameLevel
member.summary: An internal singleton that handles setting up and tearing down the humpermap.

member.name: T:Khronos.World.HumperRenderer
member.summary:
Responsible for drawing the humper collision boxes in the game on Group30. Currently ignores humper collision cells and strings.
Draws at z= -80, leaving some room for UI elements above.

member.name: T:Khronos.World.Level.Platform
member.summary: A tile-based Ground object. Records x,y,w,h in tile units and handles auto-adding to the humpermap.

member.name: T:Khronos.World.TileMerger
member.summary:
Tile Merge optimizer. Operates by operating in a Y-first (left-right) merge to find applicable cells to merge
C# adaptation of https://love2d.org/wiki/TileMerging

member.name: M:Khronos.World.TileMerger.GridMerge(Duality.Plugins.Tilemaps.Tilemap,System.Func{Duality.Plugins.Tilemaps.Tilemap,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Performs the merge. Returns a list of rectangles, representing the tilemap indices covered by the rectangles.
member.param: Function to perform the merge on. IsCollider is a natural fit.
